discrepancies.finding: Insurance document does not indicate the value of each insurer's cover
Insurance document does not clearly indicate by addition or note that coverage is effective from a date not later than the date of shipment
Invoice does not appear to have been issued by the beneficiary
Invoice does not clearly indicate the description of the goods, services or performance

compliances.finding: Invoice is presented in the required format
Insurance document is presented in the required format
Document is presented in a format that is acceptable for email presentations
